medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started on an unspecified date and has persisted since that time. The patient reports that this is the first time he has had such pain. The pain is described as sharp in nature. He was able to tolerate a diet but did not eat anything yesterday as he was feeling unwell. No changes in bowel movements were reported, and the patient did not experience any fevers or chills. There is no nausea or vomiting, and no diarrhea.
